items.sentence: When Tom explains things, I can usually understand what he's saying.
Tom tried to speak to Mary in French, but she didn't understand him.
I like swimming in lakes and rivers more than swimming in the ocean.
I don\'t have to go to the doctor any more. I\'m feeling much better.
Tom can\'t tell the difference between expensive wine and cheap wine.
She decided to marry him even though her parents didn\'t want her to.
Tom couldn\'t speak a word of French when he first arrived in France.
Tom let me stay with him for three months after my house burned down.
Tom said that he and Mary were planning to visit Australia next year.
Tom was just about to kiss Mary when his mother walked into the room.
Tom wondered how much tequila Mary could drink before she passed out.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all planning to go to the same college.
I was lucky that the train was late. Otherwise I would\'ve missed it.
It would be better if you didn\'t drink so much coffee late at night.
Everyone seemed to be very busy and everyone seemed to be in a hurry.
Tom ate part of the ham, and then put the rest into the refrigerator.
Now that you mention it, I don\'t remember seeing Tom in class today.
The best way to learn French is to live in a French-speaking country.
Tom opens the windows every morning as soon as he gets to his office.
Tom didn\'t know the reason why Mary wouldn\'t accept his invitation.
Tom realized he barely had enough money to buy what he needed to buy.
Tom rolled up his pant legs so people could see his bright red socks.
What was your relationship with your father like when you were a kid?
When I got out of jail, the first thing I did was go to a restaurant.
I don\'t think it will rain, but I\'ll take an umbrella just in case.
Don\'t you just hate the way Tom always monopolizes the conversation?
When Tom couldn\'t bear the pain any longer, he went to the hospital.
You should take your car to Tom\'s Garage. He does a pretty good job.
A few trees fell down in our neighborhood during the storm last week.
After working in the hot sun all afternoon, Tom looked hot and tired.
I came all this way. You could at least listen to what I have to say.
If I tell my mother, she\'ll worry, so I don\'t think I\'ll tell her.
Tom can\'t even play one song on his ukulele without making mistakes.
I put an advertisement in the newspaper saying my house was for sale.
I remember the event as clearly as if it had happened just yesterday.
I suggest that you go and see a doctor about this as soon as you can.
I think that perhaps both Tom and Mary have forgotten how to do that.
I want to apologize for the way I talked to you the last time we met.
I think I\'ve figured out which horse is most likely to win the race.
I\'ve heard that in Germany beer is cheaper than water. Is that true?
How long do you think the jury will take before they reach a verdict?
She intended to go shopping with her mother, but her mother was busy.
Some flowers bloom in the spring and other flowers bloom in the fall.
Mary put some flowers in the vase and then put the vase on the table.
If you\'re going to go to France, you should brush up on your French.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t likely be able to convince Mary to help him.
Tom may understand French fairly well, but doesn\'t speak it so well.
Tom didn\'t have enough time to do everything that needed to be done.
Tom didn\'t have the heart to tell Mary what had happened to her dog.
Tom didn\'t have the time to do everything that Mary asked him to do.
